items.title: Combat Encounters
items.content: Be prepared for random encounters with hostile creatures appropriate to the environment. Your DM will determine when these occur.

items.title: Local Legends

items.title: Time-Sensitive Events
items.content: Keep an eye out for quests with time limits where delays can change the outcome or reduce rewards. These situations require swift decision-making and prioritization.
